data.title: Original British American Tobacco Company Cinema Stars card, number 1, Marie Prevost and Kenneth Harlan, circa 1925
data.meta_description: N.p. British American Tobacco Comany, Circa 1925. Vintage British American Tobacco Company BAT Cinema Stars cigarette card, number 1, featuring Marie Prevost and Kenneth Harlan, circa 1925.The first of 50 Cinema Stars cigarette cards released by BAT, circa 1925, which featured Hollywood stars such as Norma Shearer, Jackie Coogan, Marion Davies, Mary Pickford, Harold Lloyd, and others, including a young Joan Crawford under her birth name, Lucille
data.text:
Marie Prevost, Kenneth Harlan

N.p. British American Tobacco Comany, Circa 1925. Vintage British American Tobacco Company (BAT) "Cinema Stars" cigarette card, number 1, featuring Marie Prevost and Kenneth Harlan, circa 1925.

The first of 50 "Cinema Stars" cigarette cards released by BAT, circa 1925, which featured Hollywood stars such as Norma Shearer, Jackie Coogan, Marion Davies, Mary Pickford, Harold Lloyd, and others, including a young Joan Crawford under her birth name, Lucille Le Sueur.

1.5 x 2.5 inches. Light soiling on the verso, else Near Fine.

[Book #160409]
